jim asks this of truck and Nan helpfully answers , fooling around with parts
banging door of truck . jim watches closely from afar as Nan manipulates parts of truck , opens and closes trunk , etc .

Nan plays alone with truck for a minute , picks up tool belt and asks , with eyes and attention still on belt . jim ignores the question .

jim still anxious about previous subject

asks for confirmation . Nan ignores and concentrates on tool belt .

for the next 10 line(s): jim off camera since Nan climbed on car . Nan drops tool belt behind her , bangs on truck compartment and then climbs onto car , jim following with gaze all the while . Nan speaks while turning wheel , finishing with direct gaze at jim
jim corrects her quietly . Nan attempts to explain wheel phenomenon but has some difficulty even though she knows what she means . Nan alternates looks between wheels painted on side and jim
